messages.title: The Liberal Democrats have proved they have what it takes to work hard for you in government
messages.content: Halved the deficit to secure the economy, bringing more jobs and growth to Britain. Delivered an £800 tax cut for over 25 million workers across the country. Protected the NHS and delivered an extra £400 million in funding for mental healthcare.

messages.title: Do you want an extreme Government?
messages.content: A Labour-led Government driven by the SNP? OR A Conservative-led Government driven by UKIP?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Halved the deficit to secure the economy, resulting in more jobs and growth for Britain.
Delivered an £800 tax cut for over 25 million workers across the country.
Protected the NHS and delivered an extra £400 million in funding for mental healthcare.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour-led government driven by the SNP? OR A Conservative-led Government driven by UKIP?
mentions.tacticalSituation: All forecasters predict a hung parliament after May 7. Portsmouth South is one of a handful of places that will decide the future of the country - a 'swing seat'. Your vote here could make sure there are enough Lib Dem MPs to ensure there's not an extreme government.

issues.economy: Halved the deficit to secure the economy.
issues.health: Protected the NHS and delivered an extra £400 million in funding for mental healthcare.

leaflet.personalStatement: Gerald Vernon-Jackson's GUARANTEE TO YOU - "If I win here, as a Liberal Democrat I will work tirelessly to keep Britain on track. I have a strong track record of keeping the city council's budget balanced, looking after the most vulnerable in the city and working hard to keep the Navy here in Portsmouth."

politicalExperience.achievements: Gerald ran the City Council, balancing the budget every year it was run under him, and never budgeted for more money than was spent.

quotes.text: All forecasters predict a hung parliament after May 7
A hung parliament looks increasingly likely
The Conservatives and Labour have come under pressure over claims they could be forced into a post-election deal with UKIP or the SNP, respectively.

images.caption: In government, the Liberal Democrats put a stop to extreme Conservative plans to...
